```typescript
export declare class DatabaseConnection 
```

|  [authmethod](./forms42core.databaseconnection.authmethod.md) |  | string | The authorization method |
|  [CONNTIMEOUT](./forms42core.databaseconnection.conntimeout.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Connection timeout in seconds, only with scope=transactional |
|  [LOCKINSPECT](./forms42core.databaseconnection.lockinspect.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Lock inspection interval in seconds, only with scope!=stateless |
|  [locks](./forms42core.databaseconnection.locks.md) |  | number | Number of row locks |
|  [MAXLOCKS](./forms42core.databaseconnection.maxlocks.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Lock limit, scope != stateless |

|  [transactional](./forms42core.databaseconnection.transactional.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Is connection scope transactional |
|  [TRXTIMEOUT](./forms42core.databaseconnection.trxtimeout.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Transaction timeout in seconds, only with scope=transactional |
